name: Crab War (itch)
description:
The crab battle had been lost,
but the crab war had just begun.

We knew this day would come.
We prepared defenses.
Get to the lighthouse to repel the invasion!

Headphones suggested; 3d audio is a major component.
The windows build has much better performance.

Controls:

  • Left Tread: Q/A
  • Right Tread: E/D
  • Aim: R-click (hold)
  • Fire: L-click
  • Options: Tab
